de.wingu.sdk.notification

Class WinguNotification

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object

        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • createSingleChannelNotification

        public static WinguNotification createSingleChannelNotification(Channel channel,
                                                                String title,
                                                                String contentText,
                                                                PendingIntent pendingIntent)
        Create notification associated with channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - Channel associated with notification, it's possible to display only one notification per channel
        title - First line of notification
        contentText - Notification description text
        pendingIntent - PendingIntent to be sent when the notification is clicked.
        See Also:
        Notification.contentIntent

      • createMissedChannelsNotification

        public static WinguNotification createMissedChannelsNotification(String title,
                                                                 String contentText,
                                                                 PendingIntent pendingIntent)
        Create notification when channels are missed.
        Parameters:
        title - First line of notification
        contentText - Notification description text
        pendingIntent - PendingIntent to be sent when the notification is clicked.
        See Also:
        Notification.contentIntent

      • createGroupNotification

        public static WinguNotification createGroupNotification(Collection<Channel> channels,
                                                        String title,
                                                        PendingIntent pendingIntent)
        Can be used to display group notification for multiple channels, content text is taken from deck if possible,
        Parameters:
        channels - are used to create description from decks titles, if size > WinguNotification.MAX_STACKED_NOTIFICATIONS there will be shown summary, to indicate more channels are around
        pendingIntent - should presumably open list with channels
        title - First line of notification

      • createDefaultChannelPendingIntent

        public static PendingIntent createDefaultChannelPendingIntent(Channel channel,
                                                              Intent parentIntent)
        Helper for create pending intent that opens ChannelDetailsActivity
        Parameters:
        channel - it's content will be opened, and title of deck will be used as activity title
        parentIntent - this intent will be added to back stack, may be null than ChannelDetailsActivity will be only activity added to stack
